name: The Virtual Room
description: Interactive 3D Cozy Hacker Room built with React & Three.js. Features professional-grade transform gizmos (Translate/Rotate/Scale), isometric aesthetics, and MLH-inspired workspace customization.
about: The Virtual Room is a creative coding exploration into interactive 3D environments. Inspired by the lo-fi aesthetic and the hacker culture of Major League Hacking (MLH), this application provides a digital sanctuary where users can design their ultimate workstation. Using professional-grade Raycasting and TransformControls, the app allows for precise manipulation of 3D objects within a stylized isometric room.
